the server-side, not the player side to help improve performance.</comment></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><comment pinned="false" h="50" w="160">Will only grow if the light level is greater than 7.</comment><value name="A"><block type="world_data_light_level"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field of the block. The number will increase 0.05 or at the same time that a tick runs in real-world time.</comment><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">growthTimer</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="block_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">growthTimer</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field><comment pinned="false" h="34" w="190">0.05 is one tick (1 / 20 = 0.05)</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="block_nbt_num_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">growthTimer</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field><comment pinned="false" h="69" w="407">Every 20 seconds the plant has a chance to grow to a new stage or not grow at all.
